page.title: 04Cornwood Parish Council
page.content: 2nd.July 1985 This meeting reflects current issues directly concerning Cornwood village. Main items discussed: 1)Dartmoor National Park boundary changes(poss. to incorporate all of parish) 2)Damage to local hedgerows 3)Poss. of VAT on evening courses at local Community College.4)Suggested reopening of tungsten mine(approx.5 miles away) and the effects on surrounding landscape and ecology.5)Community bus service to Ivybridge Health Centre, taking in local villages.6)Problems of heavy traffic through village and poss.of re-routing.7)Planning extensions to Dinnaton Country Club,including a small golf course, and guest rooms. Attended by 9 councillors,community police officer,Dartmoor park ranger, and 5 members of the public.
